Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from the venom gland of the social wasp Vespa tropica.
Literature.Author: Yang X, Wang Y, Lee WH, Zhang Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=10µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 10(MIC=40µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 37(MIC=10µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(no activity data),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=80µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CMCCB 1010(MIC=80µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=80µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae(no activity data),Escherichia coli 37(MIC=80µg/ml),Escherichia coli 117(MIC=40µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=10µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=80µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=20µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(no activity data)
